definition: To emphasize or highlight something, typically used when referring to a specific aspect or feature that stands out or deserves special attention.

examples.german: Es ist wichtig, die positiven Aspekte hervorzuheben.
examples.english: It is important to highlight the positive aspects.

examples.english: I would like to emphasize some points.

examples.english: The speaker highlighted the importance of the topic.

examples.german: Es ist notwendig, die Unterschiede deutlich hervorzuheben.
examples.english: It is necessary to clearly emphasize the differences.

examples.german: Die Werbung versucht, die Vorteile des Produkts hervorzuheben.
examples.english: The advertisement tries to highlight the advantages of the product.
